tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor listen very well, and explained the problem clearly. She answered all our queries with our satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ************* *** ************** will ask detailed questions and accordingly prescribe. visited for infertility problem and after few weeks medication and advise was benefitted.would strongly recommend

I had visited the doctor for pcod problem for which the doctor prescribed me few medicines based on the lab reports. I had vitamin d deficiency and tabs were given accordingly. What I'm surprised is that she gave tabs of diabetic saying that my insulin levels are high which is completely normal in my reports.  I'm suffering since two days with many side effects and stopped it. Pls review before going

Apollo charged 25% high consultation charges against as in practo. Doctor arrived post 30 mins from appointment time and then again waited for 15 mins. 
Overall ok with doctor but not ok with Apollo

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have visited this doctor for my wife pregancy check and over all guidance but I was not satisfied with the doctor consultation and more she is very harsh and rude. Most questions are unanswered and the patient won't feel the friendliness from the doctor. So won't recommend for the couples for their first pregnancy

She is least bothered of patients and always always in a hurry and doesn't give proper description of the problems and how to get it sorted or anything just gives some medicine and  shows negligence and no responsibility towards the patient who comes to her with a hope ðŸ˜” didn't expect this from Apollo atleast  after paying so much
She listens patientlyâ€‹, feels good to talk. You won't feel like talking to a doctor. Very approachable.
Won't turn up on scheduled time visited on two occasions both times she turned up late which is not acceptable
I will never use practo again. Doctor was not available they did not received any confirmation. Poor
